alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp; Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp; Northern Denali Borough; Southern Denali Borough; Upper Tanana Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 1:36PM AKST until January 17 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TUESDAY TO NOON AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. Visibility one half mile at times. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Upper Tanana Valley, Northern Denali Borough, Southern Denali Borough, Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp and Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp. * WHEN...From 9 AM Tuesday to noon AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp; Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp; Northern Denali Borough; Southern Denali Borough; Upper Tanana Valley
